albus.predictor.function

Class CubicSpline

  • java.lang.Object
    • albus.predictor.function.CubicSpline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<Predictor>, Writable, UnivariateFunction, Predictor, Regressor

    public class CubicSpline
extends Object
implements Regressor, UnivariateFunction
    Class for cubic splines. Given knots k, the cubic spline uses the following basis: 1, x, x^2, x^3, (x - k[i])_+^3.
